mapper.select: insert into "MBR_NTC_HST" ("MBR_NO", "NTC_PSTG_NO", "NTC_PSTG_TITL_NM", "NTC_PSTG_CN", "LGN_ID", "RCPTN_DT", "PSTART_NO") values (#{mbrNo}, default , #{ntcPsthTitlNm}, #{ntcPstgCn}, #{lgnId}, pg_catalog.clock_timestamp(), #{pstartNo}) returning *
